mapper.select: SELECT d.uid,d.plugin_name,d.scene,d.`input`,d.`output`,d.type, d.coze_token_id,d.space_id,d.entity_uid,d.entity_name, d.published,d.description,d.create_time,d.update_time, d.verify_state, u.nickname AS creator from llm_material_plugin_definition d LEFT JOIN system_users u ON d.creator = u.id where d.deleted = false
